p: When 20 per cent of the population is vaccinated, the rate of emergence of the strain with R 0 = 1.6 is slowed much more than that of the one with R 0 = 2. Taking the mean from 200 runs, figure 5 shows that while R 0 makes little difference when χ = 1, for χ < 1, the infection with R 0 = 2 can be far harder to control.
